channel.title: ::player list

item.title: ::player list
item.dc:creator: @blacksabath blacksabath
item.description:
@blacksabath wrote:

i got a problem with my ::player list um when i do it it shows all the players except the 1st player like it will go 2,3,4,5, and not 1 how do i fix this.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 12, 2009, 08:15:21 pm[/size][hr]so does anybody know how to fix this.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 13, 2009, 07:57:25 pm[/size][hr]if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“players”)) {
sM(“There are currently " + PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount()
+ " players!”);
sendQuest("@dre@blacksabathscape - Online Players", 8144);
clearQuestInterface();
sendQuest("@dbl@Online players(" + PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount()
+ “):”, 8145);
int line = 8146;
for (int i = 1; i < PlayerHandler.maxPlayers; i++) {
client playa = getClient(i);
if (!validClient(i))
continue;
if (playa.playerName != null) {
String title = “”;
if (playa.playerRights == 1) {
title = "Mod, ";
} else if (playa.playerRights == 2) {
title = "Admin, ";
}
title += “level-” + playa.combatLevel;
String extra = “”;
if (playerRights > 0) {
extra = “(” + playa.playerId + “) “;
}
sendQuest(”@dre@” + extra + playa.playerName + “@dbl@ (”
+ title + ") is at " + playa.absX + ", "
+ playa.absY, line);
line++;
}
}
sendQuestSomething(8143);
showInterface(8134);
flushOutStream();
}

Report to moderator 75.187.241.39

raped by who
Senior Member

Rep: 10
[Rep++]
Offline

 Re: ::player list

« Reply #3 on: Today at 07:00:27 pm »

My lord, that is terrible just to look at. I would help, but im scared Im going to have a seizure reading this.

Edit: I see your problem. Its honestly changing 1 little thing.

Re-read your code, you should see it aswell

i dont see it where is it can u tell me i dont see it
